name: ColorBarz
description:
GAME-PLAY
-ColorBarz is a fast paced color matching game. Colored notes come down from the top of the screen you have to match the colored note with the ColorBarzon the bottom of the screen. The notes go faster and faster as time increases making it harder to match each of the seven rows of colored notes. It looks easy at first but when you let your guard down that's when they like to sneak by.

-Simple colorful design!

-Addicting fast pace color matching!

-Hidden secret achievements!

-Compete for the top score in the world!

Thank you and have fun!
Studio12Games
